name: mri_synthseg
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: SynthSeg is a tool for brain image segmentation.

inputs.description: Image(s) to segment. Can be a path to an image or to a folder.
inputs.name: Input image or folder

inputs.description: Segmentation output(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.
inputs.name: Output segmentation

inputs.description: Bypass some processing for faster prediction.
inputs.name: Fast prediction flag

inputs.description: Clip CT scans in Hounsfield scale to [0, 80].
inputs.name: Clip CT scans flag

inputs.description: Output CSV file with volumes for all structures and subjects.
inputs.name: Output volume file

inputs.description: Output CSV file with QC scores for all subjects.
inputs.name: Output quality control file

inputs.description: Posteriors output(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.
inputs.name: Output posteriors

inputs.description: Resampled image(s). Must be a folder if --i is a folder.
inputs.name: Resampled images

inputs.description: Only analyse an image patch of the given size.
inputs.name: Image patch size

inputs.description: Number of cores to be used. Default is 1.
inputs.name: Threads

inputs.description: Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.
inputs.name: CPU execution flag

inputs.description: Photo-SynthSeg: segment 3D reconstructed stack of coronal dissection photos of the cerebrum; must be left, right, or both.
inputs.name: Photo-SynthSeg mode

output-files.description: CSV file with volumes for all structures and subjects
output-files.name: Output volume CSV

output-files.description: CSV file with QC scores for all subjects
output-files.name: Output QC CSV
